id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id to use for this SN74HC595 component.

*See also: [SN74HC595 I/O Expander (shift register)](https://esphome.io/components/sn74hc595.html#configuration-variables)*

data_pin.docs:
**[Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: Pin connected to SN74HC595 SER (SD) input.

*See also: [SN74HC595 I/O Expander (shift register)](https://esphome.io/components/sn74hc595.html#configuration-variables)*

clock_pin.docs:
**[Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: Pin connected to SN74HC595 SRCLK (SH_CP) pin

*See also: [SN74HC595 I/O Expander (shift register)](https://esphome.io/components/sn74hc595.html#configuration-variables)*

latch_pin.docs:
**[Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: Pin connected to SN74HC595 RCLK (ST_CP) pin

*See also: [SN74HC595 I/O Expander (shift register)](https://esphome.io/components/sn74hc595.html#configuration-variables)*

oe_pin.docs:
**[Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: Pin connected to SN74HC595 OE pin

*See also: [SN74HC595 I/O Expander (shift register)](https://esphome.io/components/sn74hc595.html#configuration-variables)*

sr_count.docs:
**int**: Number of daisy-chained shift registers, up-to 4. Defaults to `1`.

*See also: [SN74HC595 I/O Expander (shift register)](https://esphome.io/components/sn74hc595.html#configuration-variables)*
